Articles.Content: Thank you! I really need to learn how to use github properly. Another stupid question, is it possible to increase the altitude at which the terrain textures are still visible? It's a little lame having the suddenly disappear somewhere around 200km up.

Hi all! Is possible ATM to download this mod? if yes, where do I get this? TY!

EDIT: found^^

Edited March 13, 2015 by Carlo
Where is it??!?!?! can you tell me where is it or give me a link?
I'm off to Malaysia for two weeks I'm afraid guys. Will be out of contact while away but will bring back picz !!
Sounds nice Pingo. One of my flat-mates is Malaysian, and all I can say from chatting with him is avoid public transport
Hopefully Rbray will be back by then.

Hey whenever I use RVE the map view shows a night-side view thats fine, but the day-side of the planet is just pure white and glitching all over the place (Z-fighting I think but I could be wrong, it doesn't look much like it). I though I was running out of memory, but I've got a bit to spare... Any ideas?

Cheers, CP

Hi all, the dark side of the planets is pitch black, and the illuminated side is too bright, i tried a mod that change the luminosity, but it seems to work only on the illuminated side of the planets. There is a way that you guys know to fix this?

I also would like to eliminate the city texture on the ground (I already deleted the lights), and the first clouds layer (it appears to be very buggy and memory using), is this possible? Thank you!

edit: oh and the Sun appears very very big, covering half of my view if i have it on the screen, even in map mode, any fix for that?

Edited March 19, 2015 by Carlo
I'm eagerly awating a release since all other texture packs are full of things that never work, always something wrong.

I'm eagerly awating a release since all other texture packs are full of things that never work, always something wrong.

You should report those problems to the authors, so it can be fixed, instead of complaining about it on the forums.

Been inactive in the forums and for a long time since moving for university in October last year , but I'ts time to get back up to date with all the glorious mods out there and play some more KSP again (Only 120+ hours playing time.. I should be ashamed of myself xD) Just wanted to drop by here and just leave some more compliments for your outstanding work you achieved so far. I hope I can come by for a visit on your thread a bit more often now XD Oh and also, you probably won't see this before you're back, but enjoy your stay in Malaysia
I hope there would be a link soon. At least for the older versions.
He hasn't updated in almost 4 months. Should we consider this mod dead?

He hasn't updated in almost 4 months. Should we consider this mod dead?

Pingopete posted a page back on the 13th? That's not 4 months.

He hasn't updated in almost 4 months. Should we consider this mod dead?

Hahah, what?

I hope there would be a link soon. At least for the older versions.

When will people learn...

Oh sorry. In that case does someone know a way to get some more cloud coverage of the planet?

My planet looks great from the ground but once I get into space its pretty cloudless...
You probably installed it wrong. I recommend a quick reinstall.

Noticed that the night textures for the city don't match the daytime texture.

So I had a play and ended up with this

However... they didn't match either. So finally re textured the whole damn thing and ended up with this.

These match the daytime texture, exactly. Not sure about the colouring even though it's taken from hi level imagery so is 'technically' accurate, though not necessarily in the correct positions.

Oh, my first ever post btw, sorry for the large pictures.

Here's hoping that this and other awesome mods go from strength to strength.

I'm off to Malaysia for two weeks I'm afraid guys. Will be out of contact while away but will bring back picz !!

yeah, pingo is probably dead.

he -literally- left an out of office message. come on, guys.
Ork, welcome to the forums! Awesome stuff you've done there, hope it's the first of many contributions!
when is the download going to be up?

when is the download going to be up?

When will people learn? It would help you a lot to read through the last few pages.

I've been away for a while, but I snapped some pics of the issue I seem to be having.

http://i.imgur.com/i15oWAc.png

http://i.imgur.com/MkLyxKf.png

http://i.imgur.com/y0OhmPK.png

http://i.imgur.com/4x7WY2S.png

There doesn't seem to be anything in the logs about RVE, and I've removed Planetshine, as well as any other visual packs before following install directions.

Dunno if you got an answer, didn't see one, but it looks like you have an extra layer in there somewhere. Check out your in game EVE settings (CTRL+N) and check that you don't have a layer that got added accidentally (when this happens it will be a blank texture, but the alpha channel will be full, and it looks like what you posted).
i have read the last few pages, but i could not find when this mod will be back up :/

i have read the last few pages, but i could not find when this mod will be back up :/

From the OP:

>>Due to the sheer number of complaints about the current versions not working and/or causing people grief I've made the executive decision to

remove all downloads of the WIP RVE mod until I can produce a more reliable, stable and up to date version for all users.

In the mean time you can check the progress here on this forum thread.<<

This mod will be back up when Pingopete thinks it should be back up. Progress right now has probably slightly halted because Rbray hasn't updated EVE Overhaul in a few months.
